amendment.description: To clarify the programs of the service academies that may be subject to uniform funding and management.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3213 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3213 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S5789; text: CR S5789) To clarify the programs of the service academies that may be subject to uniform funding and management.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3213 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3213 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
